title: ORTHODONTIC TREATMENT
description: Orthodontic treatment is a way of straightening or moving teeth, to improve the appearance of the teeth and how they work. It can also help to look after the long-term health of your teeth, gums and jaw joints, by spreading the biting pressure over all your teeth.

title: CROWNS AND BRIDGES
description: A dental crown or bridge is the most common alternatives to permanent dental implants. You might need a dental bridge if you are missing one or more teeth in a row but have healthy teeth on either side of the missing teeth. The existing teeth can hold the dental bridge, which replaces the teeth that are missing.

title: DENTAL JEWELRY
description: Dental jewelry is a cosmetic dental procedure. It is a dental accessory such as a small stone, a semi-precious gem, or even a diamond placed on your tooth/teeth (usually on the tooth/teeth which will be visible in your smile â€“ anterior teeth), it helps in enhancing and making your smile unique.

title: DENTAL IMPLANTS
description: A dental implant is a prosthesis that interfaces with the bone of the jaw or skull to support a dental prosthesis such as a crown, bridge, denture, or facial prosthesis or to act as an orthodontic anchor.

title: ROOT CANAL TREATMENT
description: Root canal treatment (endodontics) is a dental procedure used to treat infection at the centre of a tooth. Root canal treatment is not painful and can save a tooth that might otherwise have to be removed completely.

title: DENTURES
description: A denture is a removable replacement for missing teeth and surrounding tissues. Two types of dentures are available -- complete and partial dentures. Complete dentures are used when all the teeth are missing, while partial dentures are used when some natural teeth remain
